sourcesContent:
import i18n from 'i18next';
import { initReactI18next } from 'react-i18next';
import LanguageDetector from 'i18next-browser-languagedetector';

i18n
  .use(LanguageDetector)
  .use(initReactI18next)
  .init({
    fallbackLng: 'sr',
    debug: false,
    interpolation: {
      escapeValue: false,
    },
    resources: {
      sr: {
        translation: {
          title: "MindLoop AI Widget za va≈° sajt",
          subtitle: "Automatizujte komunikaciju sa klijentima uz AI asistenta koji radi 24/7.",
          tryDemo: "üöÄ Isprobaj demo odmah",
          free: "besplatno",
          benefits: {
            instant: "Instant odgovori",
            smart: "Pametan AI",
            easy: "Laka integracija",
            instantDesc: "Korisnici dobijaju odgovor u sekundi ‚Äì bez ƒçekanja.",
            smartDesc: "Razume pitanja i koristi znanje va≈°e firme.",
            easyDesc: "Dodaje se bez problema na va≈° postojeƒái sajt ‚Äì bez kodiranja.",
          },
          forWhom: "Za koga je MindLoop AI?",
          sectors: "Savr≈°eno re≈°enje za sve sektore sa ƒçestim pitanjima korisnika.",
          sectorsList: ["üè® Turizam", "üöó Rent-a-car", "üè´ Edukacija", "üõç E-commerce", "üì¶ Dostava", "üì± IT servisi"],
          footerEmail: "üìß Email",
          footerPhone: "üìû Telefon",
          featuresTitle: "üîç ≈†ta sve na≈° sistem omoguƒáava:",
          features: [
            "‚úî Automatski odgovara na najƒçe≈°ƒáa pitanja",
            "‚úî Sistem preporuka",
            "‚úî Personalizovan sadr≈æaj za svaku firmu",
            "‚úî Ne zahteva dodatni softver ni kodiranje",
            "‚úî Lako se integri≈°e na bilo koji sajt",
            "‚úî Radi 24/7 bez pauze ili nadzora"
          ],
          aiAssistantTitle: "ü§ñ Automatski AI asistent:",
          aiAssistant1: "Na≈° inteligentni pomoƒánik mo≈æe trenutno da generi≈°e opis va≈°e firme, napravi strukturu sajta i predlo≈æi sadr≈æaj na osnovu va≈°e delatnosti.",
          aiAssistant2: "Samo pove≈æete na≈° vid≈æet ‚Äì i on odmah kreƒáe da komunicira sa klijentima u va≈°e ime.",
          aiAssistant3: "To je kao da imate liƒçnog savetnika koji nikada ne spava.",
        },
      },
      en: {
        translation: {
          title: "MindLoop AI Widget for Your Website",
          subtitle: "Automate client communication with an AI assistant that works 24/7.",
          tryDemo: "üöÄ Try the demo now",
          free: "free",
          benefits: {
            instant: "Instant answers",
            smart: "Smart AI",
            easy: "Easy integration",
            instantDesc: "Clients get answers in seconds ‚Äì no waiting.",
            smartDesc: "Understands questions and uses your business data.",
            easyDesc: "Easily added to your existing website ‚Äì no coding required.",
          },
          forWhom: "Who is MindLoop AI for?",
          sectors: "Perfect for any sector with frequent customer questions.",
          sectorsList: ["üè® Tourism", "üöó Car rental", "üè´ Education", "üõç E-commerce", "üì¶ Delivery", "üì± IT services"],
          footerEmail: "üìß Email",
          footerPhone: "üìû Phone",
          featuresTitle: "üîç What our system enables:",
          features: [
            "‚úî Automatically answers common questions",
            "‚úî Recommending system",
            "‚úî Personalized content for every company",
            "‚úî No extra software or coding needed",
            "‚úî Easily integrates with any website",
            "‚úî Works 24/7 without breaks or supervision"
          ],
          aiAssistantTitle: "ü§ñ Automatic AI Assistant:",
          aiAssistant1: "Our intelligent assistant can instantly generate a company description, site structure, and suggest content based on your business type.",
          aiAssistant2: "You just plug in our widget ‚Äì and it starts chatting with customers on your behalf.",
          aiAssistant3: "It‚Äôs like having a personal consultant that never sleeps.",
        },
      },
      fr: {
        translation: {
          title: "Widget MindLoop AI pour votre site",
          subtitle: "Automatisez la communication client avec un assistant IA disponible 24h/24.",
          tryDemo: "üöÄ Essayez la d√©mo",
          free: "gratuit",
          benefits: {
            instant: "R√©ponses instantan√©es",
            smart: "IA intelligente",
            easy: "Int√©gration facile",
            instantDesc: "Les clients obtiennent une r√©ponse imm√©diate.",
            smartDesc: "Comprend les questions et utilise vos donn√©es.",
            easyDesc: "Ajout√© facilement √† votre site existant ‚Äì sans code.",
          },
          forWhom: "√Ä qui s'adresse MindLoop AI ?",
          sectors: "Parfait pour tous les secteurs avec des questions fr√©quentes.",
          sectorsList: ["üè® Tourisme", "üöó Location de voiture", "üè´ √âducation", "üõç E-commerce", "üì¶ Livraison", "üì± Services informatiques"],
          footerEmail: "üìß Email",
          footerPhone: "üìû T√©l√©phone",
          featuresTitle: "üîç Ce que notre syst√®me permet :",
          features: [
            "‚úî R√©pond automatiquement aux questions fr√©quentes",
            "‚úî Syst√®me de recommandation",
            "‚úî Contenu personnalis√© pour chaque entreprise",
            "‚úî Aucun logiciel ou codage requis",
            "‚úî S'int√®gre facilement √† tout site Web",
            "‚úî Fonctionne 24h/24 sans interruption"
          ],
          aiAssistantTitle: "ü§ñ Assistant AI automatique :",
          aiAssistant1: "Notre assistant intelligent peut g√©n√©rer instantan√©ment la description de votre entreprise, cr√©er la structure du site et sugg√©rer du contenu.",
          aiAssistant2: "Connectez notre widget ‚Äì il commence √† dialoguer avec vos clients.",
          aiAssistant3: "C‚Äôest comme un conseiller personnel qui ne dort jamais.",
        },
      },
      ru: {
        translation: {
          title: "–í–∏–¥–∂–µ—Ç MindLoop AI –¥–ª—è –≤–∞—à–µ–≥–æ —Å–∞–π—Ç–∞",
          subtitle: "–ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–π—Ç–µ –æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é –ò–ò-–∞—Å—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ 24/7.",
          tryDemo: "üöÄ –ü–æ–ø—Ä–æ–±–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –¥–µ–º–æ",
          free: "–±–µ—Å–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω–æ",
          benefits: {
            instant: "–ú–≥–Ω–æ–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—ã",
            smart: "–£–º–Ω—ã–π –ò–ò",
            easy: "–õ—ë–≥–∫–∞—è –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è",
            instantDesc: "–û—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—ã –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º –∑–∞ —Å–µ–∫—É–Ω–¥—ã ‚Äì –±–µ–∑ –æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è.",
            smartDesc: "–ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã –∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç –≤–∞—à—É –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—é.",
            easyDesc: "–õ–µ–≥–∫–æ –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –Ω–∞ —Å–∞–π—Ç ‚Äì –±–µ–∑ –∫–æ–¥–∞.",
          },
          forWhom: "–ö–æ–º—É –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç MindLoop AI?",
          sectors: "–û—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç –¥–ª—è –≤—Å–µ—Ö –æ—Ç—Ä–∞—Å–ª–µ–π —Å —á–∞—Å—Ç—ã–º–∏ –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∞–º–∏.",
          sectorsList: ["üè® –¢—É—Ä–∏–∑–º", "üöó –ü—Ä–æ–∫–∞—Ç –∞–≤—Ç–æ", "üè´ –û–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ", "üõç –≠–ª–µ–∫—Ç—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–º–µ—Ä—Ü–∏—è", "üì¶ –î–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∫–∞", "üì± IT —É—Å–ª—É–≥–∏"],
          footerEmail: "üìß –≠–ª. –ø–æ—á—Ç–∞",
          footerPhone: "üìû –¢–µ–ª–µ—Ñ–æ–Ω",
          featuresTitle: "üîç –ß—Ç–æ —É–º–µ–µ—Ç –Ω–∞—à–∞ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞:",
          features: [
            "‚úî –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—á–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞ —á–∞—Å—Ç—ã–µ –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã",
            "‚úî –°–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞ —Ä–µ–∫–æ–º–µ–Ω–¥–∞—Ü–∏–π",
            "‚úî –ü–µ—Ä—Å–æ–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç –¥–ª—è –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–π –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏",
            "‚úî –ù–µ —Ç—Ä–µ–±—É–µ—Ç –¥–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ü–û –∏–ª–∏ –∫–æ–¥–∞",
            "‚úî –õ–µ–≥–∫–æ –≤—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –Ω–∞ —Å–∞–π—Ç",
